lines: Mufutuli lino twakwiimbila I lwimbo lwesu ilwakwaandana;
Twakulumbaizya notukomba I jwi lyalumuno tulipegwe.
Tupe luumuno notweenda Mulindiwe tumane musinzo;
Bamba milimo a myoyo yesu no tulyokezya munganda ino .
Tupone mu lumuno lyonse, Kotuumuzya swe mukulila,
Mwa kutwambila kuti kwamana, Mwami tu bole ku Kulyokezya
